a=[2, 8, 34, 144, 610, 2584, 10946, 46368, 196418, 832040, 3524578, 14930352, 63245986, 267914296, 1134903170, 4807526976L, 20365011074L, 86267571272L, 365435296162L, 1548008755920L, 6557470319842L, 27777890035288L, 117669030460994L, 498454011879264L, 2111485077978050L, 8944394323791464L, 37889062373143906L]

t=int(raw_input())
for test in xrange(t):
	n=int(raw_input())
	s=0
	for i in xrange(len(a)):
		s+=a[i]
		if a[i]>n:
			s-=a[i]
			break
	print s
